SEARCH
程序包 hms.utils

类 Time

java.lang.Object
hms.utils.Time
所有已实现的接口:
Comparable<Time>
public class Time extends Object implements Comparable<Time>
Represents a specific time of day with hours and minutes, ensuring provided times are valid according to specific rules.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    Time(int time)
    Constructs a Time object using an integer representation (hhmm).
    Time(int hour, int minute)
    Constructs a Time object using separate hour and minute values.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Time

      public Time(int time)
      Constructs a Time object using an integer representation (hhmm). Prompts for a valid time if the input is incorrect.
      参数:
      time - the time in hhmm format

    • Time

      public Time(int hour, int minute)
      Constructs a Time object using separate hour and minute values. Prompts for valid values if the input is incorrect.
      参数:
      hour - the hour of the time
      minute - the minute of the time

  • 方法详细资料

      public String get()
      Returns the string representation of the time in hh:mm format.
      返回:
      formatted time string

      public int getIntTime()
      Accessor of time in hhmm
      返回:
      time in hhmm

    • checkTime

      public boolean checkTime()
      Validates the time ensuring minutes are either 00 or 30, and hours are within the range of 0 to 23.
      返回:
      true if the time is valid, false otherwise

      public int compareTo(Time cmpTime)

    • min

      public static Time min(Time t1, Time t2)
      Returns the minimum of two Time objects.
      参数:
      t1 - the first Time object
      t2 - the second Time object
      返回:
      the earlier Time object

    • max

      public static Time max(Time t1, Time t2)
      Returns the maximum of two Time objects.
      参数:
      t1 - the first Time object
      t2 - the second Time object
      返回:
      the later Time object

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints the time in hh:mm format to the console.
